CheckboxConfirmation.Modal.body: Do you want to disable it?
CheckboxConfirmation.Modal.content: Disabling personalization will engender the deletion of all your content but the one associated to your default variation (if existing).
Field.personalized: This value is unique for the selected variation
Field.not-personalized: This value is common to all variations
Settings.list.actions.deleteAdditionalIn: This will delete the active variation versions (from Internationalization)
Settings.list.description: Configure the settings for the Internationalization plugin
Settings.list.empty.description: This is not a usual behavior, meaning that you have eventually modified the database manually. Make sure to have at least one variation saved in your database in order to be able to use Strapi correctly.
Settings.list.empty.title: There are no variations.
Settings.variations.modal.advanced.setAs: One default variation is required, change it by selecting another one
Settings.variations.modal.create.tab.lab: Navigating between the Personalization base settings and advanced settings
Settings.variations.modal.delete.message: Deleting this variation will delete all associated content. If you want to keep some content, make sure to reallocate it to another variation first.
Settings.variations.modal.delete.secondM: Do you want to delete this variation?
Settings.variations.modal.edit.tab.label: Navigating between the Personalization base settings and advanced settings
Settings.variations.modal.variations.dis: Variation will be displayed under that name in the administration panel
The variation display name can only be less than 50 characters.
Settings.variations.modal.variations.loa: The variations have been successfully loaded.
Settings.variations.modal.title: Configurations
Settings.permissions.read.denied.descrip: In order to be able to read this, make sure to get in touch with the administrator of your system.
Settings.permissions.read.denied.title: You don't have the permissions to access this content.
plugin.description.long: This plugin enables to create, to read and to update content in different languages, both from the Admin Panel and from the API.
plugin.description.short: This plugin enables to create, to read and to update content in different languages, both from the Admin Panel and from the API.
plugin.name: Internationalization
plugin.schema.personalization.personaliz: Allow you to have content in different variations
Allow you to have content in different variations
The field can have different values in each variation
